label: ham
subject: Customer Communications for Utilities  June 27 - 28, 2007  Boston, MA
body: And still they remain in the city; there they are, ready to sting and fully armed, and some of them owe money, some have forfeited their citizenship; a third class are in both predicaments; and they hate and conspire against those who have got their property, and against everybody else, and are eager for revolution.
